Title: WKT
Description: Returns a WKT (Well Known Text) geometric object from various Geo Data Types. Supported WKT objects are:
geo_data can be one of the following Geo Data Types or their underlying primitive types:

WKT geometric object POINT is returned for a Point.WKT geometric object POLYGON is returned for a PolygonWKT geometric object MULTIPOLYGON is returned for a MultiPolygon.WKT geometric object LINESTRING is returned for a LineString.WKT geometric object MULTILINESTRING is returned for a MultiLineString.
